```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
# import the dataset and replace all the missing values with NAs
first_dataset = read.csv("Mapping Police Violence.csv", na.strings=c("","NA"))

#remove rows with NA values in race and agency_responsible
project_dataset = filter(first_dataset, race != "Unknown race")
project_dataset = filter(project_dataset, race != "Non-white")
project_dataset = filter(project_dataset, !is.na(race))
project_dataset = filter(project_dataset, !is.na(agency_responsible))
project_dataset = filter(project_dataset, !is.na(pop_white_census_tract))
project_dataset = filter(project_dataset, !is.na(congressperson_party))


# show the distribution of races
table(project_dataset$race)
```
